title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. A, pt. 2051 - Rules Of Practice For The Office Of Rent Administration-adjudicatory Proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. A, pt. 2051 - Rules Of Practice For The Office Of Rent Administration-adjudicatory Proceedings

State Regulations
§ 2051.1 - Proceedings before the hearings unit
§ 2051.2 - Action by the administrative law judge
§ 2051.3 - Hearings
§ 2051.4 - Miscellaneous procedural matters
§ 2051.5 - Administrative review
§ 2051.6 - Limitations; severability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. A, pt. 2051

Statutory authority: Public Housing Law, §11; Emergency Housing Rent Control Law, § 8584[4][a]; Administrative Code of
the City of New York, § Y51- 5.0[g][1]; Emergency Tenant Protection Act of
1974, § 8630[a]; and Omnibus Housing Act, §
64

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
